What an interesting egg! Give it a few taps.

Peridot is a real-world, location based AR game that requires some permissions and your location to play.

There's only one Dot here. If your Dot isn't ready to Hatch-a-Dot and be released, continue growing them by completing desires and exploring the world!

You haven't discovered this Archetype yet! How mysterious! Raise more Dots, and maybe you'll uncover it.
Friends will see your Keeper name, your level, your current Peridot, and your current Peridot's name.
Congratulations! You're adopting a Stray Dot!
Start raising your new adopted {creatureName} or continue with {otherCreatureName}?
Check out the map now that {creatureName} can Hatch-a-Dot.
Dots only hang out at Habitats for a limited time or until a Dot Hatch-a-Dots with them.
The map is where you can see all the Habitats in your area. Tap one of the markers to see Wild Dots and Dots other players have released.
Look at that! {creatureName} has become an adult!
Are you sure? Adventure Sync offers a lot of rewards!
Receive in game rewards while getting your fitness on! This feature will collect location data, even when the app is closed or not in use.
Sorry! Adventure sync is not supported on your device.
Tracks distance and location while the app is closed or not in use
Nancy's Saga, Chapter 1  A Dot with a big wish had to go on a big adventure...
Nancy's Saga, Chapter 1  There was a Dot who had a wish to hold all the wisdom in the world. They would need to travel far to get it, and shapeshift to travel far!
Nancy's Saga, Chapter 1  There once was a Dot who desired all the wisdom in the world. With ancient shapeshifting powers, they grew many legs to travel the world with!
{creatureName} raised hell with a rag-tag group of Peridots at {poiName} whilst you were away! They made sure everything was back in order before you got back though.
{creatureName} found some cool plants while you were away, but they weren't sure if they were poisonous. So naturally they ate a few of them! So far, so good.

We have detected activity on your account that indicates you are using modified client software or unauthorized third-party software in violation of our Terms of Service.

You may experience degraded gameplay for approximately 7 days.

We strongly encourage you to stop this activity. Any further transgressions will result in an account suspension.
We're having trouble tracking the world around you. If this problem persists, please contact support.
I want the gold. Give me the gold!
What an aerodynamic design! Also, they're yellow.
There's just so much buzz around these fuzzy Dots.
Every Dot has its thorn. These ones especially!
Puts gold stars on everything. Like. Everything.
Can often be found inside of cardboard boxes and savannahs.
Hard to find, but definitely worth looking for!
Cute enough to eat! (Please don't though).
Are Dewdrops named after these Dots, or the other way around?
Party in the front, and no tail in the back.
Nobody's Fool. Ok, maybe Some Peoples' Fool.
The art of mending broken pottery with gold and celebrating imperfections. It can teach us that even when we feel broken, we are actually more beautiful and valuable than before.
Don't leave them around Banana Dots.
A mosaic of colors and a mosaic of pattern.
They love streetlamps, but not for the reason you think.
A patina is the layer that forms on the surface of an object due to natural processes or intentional treatments, giving it an aged and unique appearance.
Such beautiful plumes! They don't hesitate to show them off.
Eating grass is one of their special skills.
We're all rooting for these Dots!
Don't get into a headbutting contest with them.
This archetype has toxic colors and a dark face.
The Dot! The Myth! The Legend!
What's black, white, and cute all over?
Hatch Peridots and aim to collect all the Peridot Archetypes! Each one has its own attributes that make it look extra special.

In order to unlock this Archetype, your Dot must have a combination of these Traits.

Some Archetypes have hidden requirements too!
The Keeper Society is always on the lookout for more Archetypes to discover!
Uh oh! Looks like authorization was revoked:
Track your previous Peridots here after Hatch-a-Dotting a new one.
Check out how cool my Peridot is! Adopt yours today by downloading at get.playperidot.com! #playperidot
Do you want to Hatch-a-Dot again and raise a different Baby Dot?
Do you want to raise this new Dot?
*You will not be able to get the same Baby Dot back.
Which Peridot looks interesting to you?
{creatureName} is all grown up! You can use Sundrops to Hatch-a-Dot them with another Dot.

You can Hatch-a-Dot by pairing up one of your Adult Dots with another Keeper’s Adult Dot, resulting in 3 eggs. You can then hatch one of these eggs into an adorable Baby Dot that you can raise.

 The Baby Dot will inherit a mix of Traits and Colors from their parents, so try and experiment with as many combinations as you can!

The magical energy imbued in Gemstones temporarily unlocks all Traits on both Parent Dots!

 If you choose a Baby Dot that inherited a Locked Trait, it will be permanently unlocked for you to use in the future.

Dots enjoy giving each other shiny objects as courting gifts. In order to Hatch-a-Dot, you must spend a Nest and either Gemstones or Sundrops (both of which are very shiny).

 Dots with many Mythic and Epic Traits are more persnickety than Dots with Common Traits, and require more Sundrops or Gemstones to be spent by their Keeper.

Dots that are physically close to each other also require less Sundrops or Gemstones than far-away Dots.
Are you sure you want to Hatch-a-Dot?
Hatch-a-Dot not allowed for Guest Accounts, please authenticate with a Google or Apple account!

Upgrade required. Please visit AppCenter.
 Current version: {buildVersion}

Caled's Saga, Chapter 1  A magic stone appeared, burning bright through the trees.
Caled's Saga, Chapter 1  A magic gemstone appeared out of nowhere in the middle of a forest. Its glow could be seen for miles.
Caled's Saga, Chapter 1  One day, a magic gem stone encased in stone appeared in the middle of a forest. Its glow pierced through the stone, into the heart of the forest.
{creatureName} watched the leaves drift slowly through the breeze around {poiName} while you were gone!
{creatureName} went to a quiet spot to meditate while you were away. They've never felt more zen!
Why access to your camera is needed
Camera access will allow you to see, interact, take photos, and record videos of your Peridots in your real world environment.
Peridot is a real world augmented reality game and needs access to your camera while playing.
We've sent an invite to {otherPlayerCodename} to make a Campfire account!
In order to Hatch-a-Dot, make sure the following requirements are met:
Huma's Saga, Chapter 1  High in the sky, a Dot used their position for good.
Huma's Saga, Chapter 1  A Dot floating through the sky saw a man down below who needed help!
Huma's Saga, Chapter 1  There was once a cautious but kind Dot circled the skies looking for people to help. One day, they spied a poor, dishevelled human in distress.
{creatureName} found some cool plants while you were away, but they weren't sure if they were poisonous. So naturally they left them alone!
While you were away some humans came up to {creatureName}. They weren't sure what to make of them, so they thought they'd check with you first.
Momo's Saga, Chapter 1  A curious peach-shaped egg, floated.
Momo's Saga, Chapter 1  A curious peach-shaped egg arrived on the banks of a river. Inside, a downright peachy Kintsugi was about to hatch!
Momo's Saga, Chapter 1  A fabled peach egg arrived on the banks of a river. Other creatures tapped at it until golden cracks split: the fabled Kintsugi Momo was born!
{creatureName} went out and befriended some humans at {poiName} while you were gone. They couldn't wait for you to return!
While you were gone, {creatureName} got carried away cloud gazing. Either they were hungry, or a lot of clouds looked Prickly Beet-shaped!
Claim your Dotnip for the day
Woah! {creatureName} is now an adult and can Hatch-a-Dot with compatible Peridots at Habitats!
{creatureName} is growing! They grow up so fast.
{creatureName} became a teen! One day they'll want to be released at a Habitat.
Only use letters and numbers with no spaces

You already have that Keeper name. Choose a different Keeper name
Complete their Desires, give them Attention, and keep them Full to help them grow!
Raising your Baby Dot to an Adult
Sang's Saga, Chapter 1  There was a Dot who was small but mighty!
Sang's Saga, Chapter 1  There once was a Dot who was small in size, but mighty in wit and confidence!
Sang's Saga, Chapter 1  There was once a wily Peridot named Sang. Although they were smaller than their friends, their fast mind and courage more than made up for it.
{creatureName} practiced some striking poses while you were gone. They've almost perfected them!
{creatureName} jumped in all the puddles they could find while you were away. They like making a splash!
Do you want to hatch a new Peridot and raise the next generation? You'll still be able to hang with your current Dot later.

To Hatch-a-Dot, bring an adult Dot to a Habitat, match them with a cool Dot there, spend the required amount of Sundrops, and wait for sparks to fly!
A little freebie for a completionist Keeper!
They want to do something with you!
Peridots get new Desires every hour or so, their agile minds are constantly thinking of fun stuff to do with you!
Peridots get new Desires every hour or so, their agile minds are constantly thinking of fun stuff to do with you!
Peridots get new Desires every hour or so, their agile minds are constantly thinking of fun stuff to do with you!
There are many different types of food that Peridots can eat, try foraging on a new surface to find a new kind of food!
Feed your Dot by going into your backpack, opening your lunchbox, and tossing a them a tasty treat!
You and your Dot can find new foods and other items by drawing a circle on bushes, ground, trees, and even water.
You and your Dot can find Kelp and other items by drawing a circle on water.
You and your Dot can find Prickly Beets and other items by drawing a circle on sand.
You and your Dot can find Spring Onions and other items by drawing a circle on dirt.
You and your Dot can find Blue Tomatoes and other items by drawing a circle on leaves or bushes.
You and your Dot can find Dandelions and other items by drawing a circle on grass.

Earn a cool bonus for each day you log in!
Give your Dot pets by rubbing them with your finger. When they really love it, they roll over on their side!
To visit a Habitat, get close to one and have your creature forage there. What Habitats will you explore?
To visit a Habitat, get close to one and have your creature forage there. What Habitats will you explore?
Walk 1km to earn some Gemstones. Use your reward from this Desire in the Store! Turn on Adventure Sync to count the steps you take with your Dot.
Show your Dot a tree trunk by viewing one through your device. Use your reward from this Desire in the Store!
Spring Onion can be found by foraging in dirt. Once you find it, feed it to your Dot. Use your reward from this Desire in the Store!
Show your Dot a flower by viewing one through your device! Use your reward from this desire in the Store!
Find a Dewdrop to earn some Gemstones. It's rare, but you can find it by foraging across surfaces. Use your reward from this Desire in the Store!
Work on a Trick with your Peridot by choosing a food, drawing a Trick gesture, and rewarding your Dot with a treat!
Find a ball by foraging on any surface. Give it a toss to {creatureName} and see them run for it!
Walking your Peridot helps them grow. Turn on Adventure Sync to count the steps you take with your Peridot.
Once your Peridot account is deleted, it will no longer be accessible by you or anyone else. This action cannot be undone.
These are your current Peridot's Desires. Complete them to help your Dot grow, and eventually they’ll become mature enough to Hatch-a-Dot with other Peridots at Habitats.

Muri's Saga, Chapter 1  A Dot set themselves the ultimate challenge: racing the sun!
Muri's Saga, Chapter 1  There was once a Dot who had big plans for each day, but they always ran out of daylight before they could do it all.
Muri's Saga, Chapter 1  The fabled Dot Muri was bursting with energy. Yet, try as they might, they could never get as much done in the day as they wanted before sunset!
{creatureName} raced some wild Dots to {poiName} and back while you were gone! Naturally, they won the race!
{creatureName} zoomed over to {poiName} while you were gone. And there. And back. And there. And back!

Find some food by drawing a circle on the ground. Once you find it, feed it to your Dot!
Find a Spring Onion by foraging in the dirt. Once you find it, feed it to your Dot.
Find a Blue Tomato by foraging in some foliage, like bushes or tree leaves! Once you find it, feed it to your Dot.
Find a Dandelion by foraging in the grass. Once you find it, feed it to your Dot.
Prickly Beets can be found by foraging in the sand. Once you find it, feed it to your Dot.
Sandwiches can be found by foraging on tile, carpet, or other man-made surfaces. Once you find it, feed it to your Dot.
Kelp can be found by foraging in water. Once you find it, feed it to your Dot.

Visit the map and look for Habitats! Now that your Peridot is an adult, you can use Sundrops to Hatch-a-Dot a new Dot.
What a truly unique creature - a Peridot!
This adorable creature is a peridot
They've been gone for a long time, but a few have reappeared recently.
As Keepers, we can act as guides for Peridots in our world,
And help to repopulate this incredibly diverse species.
Once your Peridot is an adult, you can use Sundrops to Hatch a new Dot. Your Dot's family will be completely unique!

Your Peridot is ready to explore the world! Visit a Habitat to see compatible Dots that live there. When you Hatch-a-Dot, you'll get a new generation of Peridot! You can alway hang with your previous Dot by using a Nest.
Hatch-a-Dot with another Peridot at a Habitat
Who doesn't love a good scratch? Try rubbing them on their head with your finger.
Your Peridot is so curious about trees! You can also help them discover pets, people, and flowers too by pointing your device's camera toward the object.

Jin's Saga, Chapter 1  A group of Peridots were invited to a heavenly place.
Jin's Saga, Chapter 1  A long time ago, an emperor invited a group of special Dots to their palace.
Jin's Saga, Chapter 1  Once long ago, a legendary Dot and their nine children were invited to the palace of the emperor. They needed to be on their best behaviour.
{creatureName} chased their own shadow all the way to {poiName} while you were away. It followed them all the way home, too!
{creatureName} accidentally walked in some wet cement whilst you were gone. If you see some small footprints nearby, you know who they belong to!

Petting your Peridot fills their Attention Meter. As you fill this up, your Dot grows!
{creatureName} foraged while you were away and brought back a Black Mustache.
{creatureName} foraged while you were away and brought back a Brown Mustache.
{creatureName} foraged while you were away and brought back a Crown.
Welcome back! {creatureName} went traveling while you were away and found a flower. Did you know {creatureName} can recognize flowers?
{creatureName} ran around in the flower fields while you were away.
{creatureName} foraged in the dirt while you were away and brought back a Spring Onion.
{creatureName} went traveling and brought you back a Blue Tomato from the foliage.
{creatureName} wanted to surprise you. They foraged in the grass and brought you back a Dandelion!
{creatureName} foraged in the sand while you were away and brought back a Prickly Beet.
{creatureName} foraged in the water while you were away and brought back some Kelp.
{creatureName} went traveling and met up with {otherCreatureName} while you were away. Add more friends for more chances to meet with other Peridots!
{creatureName} and {otherCreatureName} compared tails while you were away. Add more friends to learn about new Archetypes and genes you haven't discovered!
{creatureName} visited {poiName} while you were away. It'd be great to take {creatureName} there and snap a picture!
{creatureName} went traveling to visit {poiName} and noticed that there are other Peridots there!
Every hour when you come back to check on your Peridot there's a chance they'll have gone on a Travel! They may have gone to a Habitat, met some friends, or who knows what else!

Look at that! {creatureName} is growing up, and all because you completed their Desires. Once they reach adulthood, you can go to a Habitat and see what other Dots are there to Hatch-a-Dot with.
The food in your bag only lasts for so long!  Each day your food will age and will eventually be removed from your bag.
You can use Sundrops to Hatch-a-Dot with another Dot. After you Hatch-a-Dot, switch back to your former Dot to hangout whenever you want.
Your Notebook is where you'll be able to see your Peridot's age, traits, and personality. You can even see your tracked Dots and all the Peridot Archetypes you've bred on your Dot page.
These are all the Dots other players have released at this Habitat.  Some traits are only inheritable if you are an experienced enough Keeper. Complete weekly quests to level up!
When your Peridot is unhappy, they will refuse to forage. Walk them, pet them, feed them food or Dotnip, or visit Habitats to make them happy again.
If you remove a Desire before it expires overnight, your Peridot will lose some happiness. If they become too unhappy, they might not do everything you ask them to.
Get up close and pet {creatureName} to fulfill their Desire!
Walking is the fastest way for your Peridot to grow. Peridot needs access to your location in the background in order to count the steps you take with your creature.
Hip's Saga, Chapter 1  One Peridot spied another, and fell hard!
Hip's Saga, Chapter 1  There was once a fast-running Peridot. One day they spotted another Peridot, and instantly became smitten.
Hip's Saga, Chapter 1  There once lived a sweet, naive Peridot named Hip, who could run as fast as the wind. One day, they saw another Dot, Atta, and became smitten.

Peridots have seven categories of Traits that correspond to their different physical characteristics, like ears and horns.

 Many Traits start as locked and become unlocked as you level up on your Keeper’s Journey.

When you Hatch-a-Dot, each Baby Dot has an equal chance of inheriting any unlocked Traits from its parents.
This represents how hungry your Dot is. Feed them to help them grow!

This represents how bored your Dot is. Playing with them also helps them grow.

You can do this by Petting them, playing Fetch, and practicing Tricks.

These Dots were in the area with their Keepers, and wanted to stop by and say Hi! You can view their traits, and even request to Hatch with them.
{creatureName} is an adventurous one. They dream of climbing Mt. Everest.
{creatureName} is a total bozo! They often wear tragically goofy footwear.
{creatureName} is a brainstormer. {creatureName} has a new idea.
{creatureName} is a bull in a china shop! They shouldn't be left with breakable objects.
{creatureName} is very calm. They are surprisingly tolerant of small children.
{creatureName} is a cautious one. They give careful and due consideration to changes in their environment.
{creatureName} is a cheerful one. They always looking on the bright side.
{creatureName} is such a cheerleader. Other dots get hyped around them!
{creatureName} is a child at heart! Every moment is an opportunity for playtime!
What a class clown! {creatureName} is always pulling pranks.
{creatureName} is a total court jester! hey control the kingdom without being the King.
What a crooner. {creatureName} sings a sentimental song.
{creatureName} is a crowd favorite! You can find {creatureName} being a social butterfly anywhere you go.
{creatureName} is a daredevil! You never know what {creatureName} will do next.
{creatureName} is data driven. They'll know what their personality is like once they've looked at the data.
{creatureName} appreciates tragically goofy footwear... the goofier, the better!
{creatureName} shouldn't be left with breakable objects.
{creatureName} is surprisingly tolerant of small children.
{creatureName} gives careful and due consideration to changes in their environment.
{creatureName}'s always looking on the bright side.
{creatureName} controls the kingdom without being the King.
You can find {creatureName} being a social butterfly anywhere you go.
You never know what {creatureName} will do next.
{creatureName} will know what their personality is like once they've looked at the data.
{creatureName} thinks there's no time like the present!
When the waters get rough, {creatureName} stays the course.
{creatureName} tends to be 10 steps ahead of the other Dots at all times.
{creatureName} sticks their tongue out at you.
A wild Saturday night for {creatureName} involves a settling into a nice, cosy nook.
Other Dots keep asking about {creatureName}'s morning routine.
{creatureName} commands the respect of every creature they encounter.
The hills are alive, with the sounds of {creatureName}.
{creatureName} would believe you if you told them water isn't wet!
{creatureName} is known to stay up late.
If you had some balloons, {creatureName} would try and pop them.
{creatureName} is great at solving conflicts between their friends.
{creatureName} will protect you with all their might.
If you try and steal {creatureName}'s sunshine, you'll find they always have more!
Somehow, {creatureName} probably knows the human classics better than you do!
If you drop a hint, {creatureName} will pick it up in an instant!
{creatureName} will always be there for you.
{creatureName} is going to need you to spell that out for them.
{creatureName} doesn't work hard, they work smart.
You can find {creatureName} being a social butterfly anywhere you go.
{creatureName} is always gravely evaluating your actions.
Not even a cute kitten can change {creatureName}’s poker face.
Nobody can get one word in when {creatureName}'s around.
You wouldn't understand {creatureName}! It's not a phase!
{creatureName} *totally* knows a joke when they hear one... They *absolutely* don't believe it as truth...
If there were tests for Peridots, {creatureName} would have a perfect score.
{creatureName} cautions you to not jump on the bed.
{creatureName} always lets others go before them, even if they're in a hurry.
{creatureName} has seen things you couldn't even imagine.
{creatureName} is having trouble choosing a plane to exist on.
{creatureName} is always gravely evaluating your actions.
{creatureName} likes to take long walks to think about life.
{creatureName} feels uneasy in a space full of strangers.
You can count on {creatureName} to give 110% effort on everything. Everything!
{creatureName} has no one to dance with.
{creatureName} peers around in wonder and awe.

{creatureName} is itching to get out and meet other Dots, and learn about themselves in the process! Forage at a Habitat to discover more about your Peridot's personality.  Discover more traits to boost your Peridot's compatibility with other Dots you come across at Habitats.

Each Peridot is born with a unique personality, like Timid or Somber, that develops as it grows. You might see it come out when it walks, hops, and interacts with the world around it.
